message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this valuable product. Given its unique features, I'm asking for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is quite a bit below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but I can't go as low as $9,000.  This product is worth significantly more. To be fair, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is my final offer.
I understand that the product is valuable, but I've done my research and I'm willing to meet you at $9,500. I'm willing to make a deal at this price.
